examples: The humanitarian scientist called for the improvement of the poor's living condition. 這位人道主義科學家呼籲改善窮人的生活條件。
related: humanitarian 名 人道主義者
humanitarian aid 名 人道救援

examples: It is admirable to have love for humankind. 對全人類心懷愛心是值得敬佩的。
related: mammal 名 哺乳類動物

examples: The police asked him to show his identity card. 員警讓他出示身份證。
related: ID card 名 身分證
identity verification 名 身份辨識

examples: The town's changed a lot since I was a lad. 從我幼時至今，這小城市已有了很大變化。
I feel at home living here. The landlady is very kind to me. 我覺得住在這裡像在家裡一樣。房東太太對我很好。
I've got to go now. My landlord is waiting for me. 我該走了，我的房東在等我。
Do you know the master of this house? 你認識這棟房子的主人嗎？
The painting is done by a great master. 這幅畫是名家之作。
It's not difficult to master a foreign language. 要精通一門外語並不難。
He made an effort to master himself. 他竭力控制住自己的情緒。
He has been an orphan since he was five. 他五歲時即成為孤兒。
She was orphaned at the age of ten. 她在十歲時成為孤兒。
related: parent 名 父母親；雙親

examples: His grandfather was a miser. 他爺爺是個吝嗇鬼。
The dog ran alongside his mistress. 狗在女主人的身邊奔跑。
He is self-taught and never went to school. 他是自學的，沒有上過學。
Football is our most popular spectator sport. 足球是最受我們歡迎；最能吸引觀眾的一項運動。
They taught the little boy not to talk to strangers. 他們教育小男孩不要和陌生人說話。
My elder sister had a baby last month, so I am an aunt now. 我姐姐上個月生了孩子，所以我現在是阿姨了。
related: uncle 名 伯父；叔父；姑父；姨丈；舅父

examples: All but my auntie have had lunch. 除了我的嬸嬸以外，大家都吃了午餐。
He was born in Atlanta. 他出生在亞特蘭大。
She was born to be a star. 她天生就是當明星的料。
He is a born athlete. 他是天生的運動家。
The bride was dressed in a beautiful white dress. 新娘穿了一襲美麗的白色禮服。
related: wedding dress; wedding gown 名 婚紗
maid of honor 名 伴娘

examples: Her bridegroom is a handsome young man. 她的新郎是一個英俊的年輕人。
He believes in the brotherhood of all people. 他相信各民族間都應親如兄弟。
related: fraternity 名 （美）大學的兄弟會

examples: He is a distant cousin of mine. 他是我的一位遠房表親。
The Sampson clan gathered for the wedding. 辛普森家族因為婚禮而聚集在一起。
He is a descendant of Queen Victoria. 他是維多利亞女王的後裔。
Domestic violence is a serious problem in this community. 家庭暴力是這個社區的嚴重問題。
Some people think we should put more emphasis on domestic issues. 有些人認為我們應該更注意內政。
related: domestic worker 名 家庭幫傭
domestic flight 名 國內航班

examples: She loves her fiancé very much. 她非常愛她的未婚夫。
His fiancée is a lawyer. 他的未婚妻是個律師。
The mother tried to foster her son's interest in music. 母親設法培養兒子對音樂的興趣。
He is very grateful to his foster parents. 他對他的養父母非常感激。
related: foster parent 名 養父（母）

examples: "It's your grandchild?" "Oh, shut up, you put years on me." 「這是你的孫子嗎？」「啊，別說了！你把我說得那麼老了。」
Susan gave her pearl necklace to her granddaughter as birthday gift. 蘇珊將珍珠項鏈作為生日禮物送給了孫女。
Although his grandfather was a nobleman, he was very poor. 儘管他的祖父是貴族，他卻非常窮困。
related: senior citizen 名 老人（委婉語）

examples: Grandma could hardly believe it. 奶奶簡直不能相信這件事。
It's very noble of you to look after my old grandmother when I was out for business. 你心地真好，在我出差期間照顧我年邁的外婆。
I wish you would mention me to Mary, John, and especially, to grandpa. 我希望你代我問候瑪麗、約翰，尤其是爺爺。
related: gray 形 灰白頭髮的

examples: The old woman led her grandson by the arm. 那老婆婆牽著外孫的手。
related: childlike 形 天真的；孩子般的

examples: She is an interesting person but her husband is a real nothing. 她是個很有趣的人，但是她的先生卻一無是處。
All his kin were at the wedding. 他的家人和親戚都參加了婚禮。
He is kin to his brothers. 他和他的哥哥們很相似。

senses.zh: 主持婚禮；使……在婚姻中結合

examples: The priest married Derek and Jane last month. 上個月牧師主持了德里克和珍的婚禮。
Paul asked her to marry him. 保羅請她嫁給他。
The performance marries poetry and music. 這個表演結合詩歌與音樂。
Their divorce has profoundly impacted their son. 他們倆人的離婚對兒子造成很大影響。
Are you married? 你是已婚的嗎？
related: single 形 單身的；未婚的
single parent 名 單親爸爸（媽媽）

senses.zh: 同伴 **名** 配偶 **動** 配對

examples: I'm off for a drink with my mates. 我要和同事出去喝一杯。
related: housemate 名 住在同一房屋之人

examples: To my surprise, I found my nephew dressed in a girl's skirt. 令我驚奇的是，我姪子穿著女孩的裙子。
related: nephew-in-law 名 姪女的老公

examples: You should take care of your niece for the sake of your sister. 看在姊妹的份上，你應該照顧你的姪女。
related: nephew-in-law 名 姪女的老公

examples: She treats her stepchild so well that the kids regard her as their true mother. 她對她前夫的孩子如此之好以至於他們認為她是親生母親。
It is complicated for stepfathers to deal with the relationship with the kids. 對繼父來說處理和孩子們的關係很複雜。
Jobs are available for spouses of the staff members on campus and in the community. 校園和社區裡有員工配偶可做的工作。
His stepmother is kind to him. 他的繼母對他很和善。
related: Snow White 名 白雪公主

examples: She gave birth to twins. 她生了一對雙胞胎。
He is wedded to a famous movie star. 他和一位著名的電影明星結婚。

senses.zh: 協會；公會；社團；聯盟 **名** 聯合

examples: He is a member of the Association of University Teachers. 他是大學教師聯合會的一名成員。
The beggar dressed in rags. 這個乞丐衣衫襤褸。
Moses led the Israelites out of their bondage in Egypt. 摩西率領以色列人擺脫在埃及的奴隸生涯。
Leave that little girl alone, you big bully! 離那小女孩遠點，你這個大壞蛋！
The manager tried to bully his men into working harder by threatening them with dismissal. 經理企圖以解雇來威脅，迫使員工更賣力。

senses.zh: 公眾的；市民的 **形** 【法律】民事的

examples: The American Civil War broke out during the presidency of Lincoln. 在林肯就職其間，美國爆發了內戰。
He is trying to be civil. 他試著表現禮貌。
A crowd gathered at the scene of the fire. 許多人聚集在火災現場。
Don't crowd me! Give me room to think! 不要逼我！給我空間讓我想想！
Social customs vary greatly from country to country. 國與國之間的社會習俗有很大差異。
It's my custom to take a nap for an hour after lunch. 我的習慣是午餐後會午睡一小時。
She is always dressed in a feminine style. 她的穿著總是非常女性化。
related: feminist 名 女性主義者

examples: They painted the room in gay colors. 他們用鮮艷的顏色粉刷房間。
I've never lived in one place for long. It must be the gypsy in me. 我從來沒有在一個地方長住過，一定是我性格中有吉普賽人的特性。
related: wandering 形 流浪的；徘徊的

senses.zh: （學位等）名譽上的；（官職等）名譽職位的

examples: Mr. Brown was appointed as an honorary head of this university last year. 布朗先生自從去年起擔任這個學校的名譽校長。
Which country will be the host country for the next Olympic Games? 哪個國家將是下屆奧運會的主辦國？
A teacher can't give individual attention to each pupil if the class is large. 如果班上的人數多，老師就不能給予個別輔導了。
Her teacher encouraged her to be an individual. 她的老師鼓勵她活出自己的特色。
This coat is masculine. 這件外衣是男式的。
"Prince" is the masculine form of "princess". 「prince」是「princess」的陽性詞。
related: manly 形 有男子氣概的
aggressive 形 好鬥的；侵略的

examples: He spends money as if he were a millionaire. 他花起錢來像個百萬富翁似的。
related: from rags to riches 名 由窮致富

examples: The police arrived to control the football mob. 警察趕來以控制鬧事的足球迷。
The pop singer was mobbed by teenagers. 那個唱流行歌曲的歌手被一群青年團團圍住。
You'll find the hotel in the neighborhood. 你會在附近找到這家飯店。
All the participants in the debate have an opportunity to speak. 所有參加辯論的人都有機會發言。
The company's main problem is the shortage of skilled personnel. 這家公司的主要問題是缺少有技術的人員。
You mustn't do that in a public place. 你不應在公共場所（或大庭廣眾之中）做這種事。
This law has been passed for the public safety. 通過這條法律是為了保證公眾的安全。
London has a population of ten million. 倫敦有一千萬人口。
related: demographic 形 人口統計學的

examples: Prince Charles will be the next king of England. 查理斯王子將是英國的下一位國王。
related: Prince Charming 名 白馬王子

examples: Princess Anne is the daughter of Queen Elizabeth. 安妮公主是伊莉莎白女王的女兒。
related: tiara 名 （尤指地位高的女性的）王冠；后冠

examples: We should not have racial discrimination. 我們不該有種族歧視。
In the army, a general is of a higher rank than a captain. 在陸軍裡將軍的軍銜比上尉高。
She is from a family of rank. 她來自一個上流家庭。
Don't rank me among such people. 不要把我與這些人列在一起。
The boy is nothing but a rascal. 這個男孩是個小淘氣。
related: naughty 形 頑皮的；淘氣的
brat 名 頑童；小搗蛋

examples: Politics and religion are daily topics of conversation. 政治和宗教是人們平常交談的主要話題。
These two countries have had three religious wars in the past twenty years. 這兩個國家在 20 年裡發生過三次宗教上的衝突。
He is a religious person. 他是在個在宗教上很虔誠的人。
The residents of the town are proud of its new library. 該鎮的居民都為鎮上新建的圖書館感到自豪。
This is your resident DJ signing off for another week with our signature tune. 這是本台流行音樂常駐唱片節目主持人，現在播放本臺臺歌來結束我們為您安排的這一星期的節目。
The marriage rites in India take three days to complete. 在印度的婚禮要花三天完成。
related: rite of passage 名 成年禮

examples: The site of this ancient ritual is a tourist site in this city. 這個古代儀式是這個城市的一個旅遊景點。
This film involved a ritual dance. 這部電影引入了一段祭神的舞蹈。
I come here today to express my solidarity with the people of New York. 我今天來表示我與紐約人民的團結一心。
A patient throng was waiting in silence. 一大群人耐心地靜候著。
Crowds of people thronged to watch the game. 成群的人們蜂擁著去看那比賽。
Chinese people have the tradition of strong family bonds. 中國人有很強烈的家族關係傳統。
The traditional breakfast in this area includes bacon and eggs. 這個地區傳統的早餐包括火腿和雞蛋。
The youth like to follow the trends in fashion. 年輕人喜好追求最新的流行款式。
Tribal lore and customs have been passed down orally. 部落的知識和風俗口耳相傳保存下來。
related: aboriginal 形 土著的；原始的

examples: I hate the whole tribe of politicians. 我不喜歡全部的政客。
related: primitive 形 原始的；早期的

examples: Get off my bike, you little villain! 別動我的腳踏車，你這個混蛋！
That widow is a kind person. 那個寡婦是個善良的人。
The widower has never married again. 那鰥夫未曾再娶。
related: single parent 名 單親家庭

examples: The cruel man abandoned his wife and child. 那個狠心的男人拋棄了他的妻子。
I am not acquainted with her. 我和她不太熟。
I have a little acquaintance with Japanese. 我不太懂日文。
She is just a business acquaintance. I don't know her very well. 她只是和我在業務上有來往。我和她不太熟。
I admire your courage, but I don't think it's a good idea to take the risk. 我欣賞你的勇氣，但我並不覺得冒險是個好主意。
related: admirer 名 讚賞者；愛慕者
attractive 形 有吸引力的

examples: I suggest you adopt a different strategy. 我建議你採取另外一種策略。
They have no children of their own, so they adopted a baby boy. 他們沒有親生兒女，就收養了一個小男孩。
related: foster family 名 領養家庭

examples: They've made an urgent request for international aid. 他們緊急請求國際援助。
Aid to the Third World is a little more than a drop in the ocean. 對第三世界的援助不過是杯水車薪。
related: first aid kit 名 急救藥箱

examples: His audacity amazed me. 他的無禮讓我驚駭。
He looked at me in amazement. 他一臉訝異地看著我。
I must apologize for not being able to meet you. 我因為沒能去見你而向你道歉。
Your allegations are completely untrue, and I demand an immediate apology. 你的說法完全不真實，我要求立即道歉。
The audience applauded frantically. 聽眾瘋狂地鼓掌。
To our astonishment, they declined our proposal. 使我們驚訝的是，他們拒絕了我們的提議。
Could you give us some assistance with this work? 你能就這項工作給我們一些幫助嗎？
Our teacher suggested he attend a technical school. 我們的老師建議他去上技職學校。
She beckoned me to follow her. 她招手要我跟過去。
Their behavior toward me shows that they do not like me. 他們對我的舉止說明他們不喜歡我。
He has a strong bias against foreigners. 他對外國人有強烈的偏見。
Mass media shouldn't hold biased views of politics. 大眾媒體不應該存有政治上的偏見。
Intelligence can be a blessing as well as a curse. 才智可能是祝福也可能是詛咒。
related: a blessing in disguise 名 禍中福

examples: Don't believe him; he is just boasting. 別相信他，他只是在吹噓罷了。
What he said is not a boast. 他所說的並不是自誇。
He caressed his wife lovingly. 他愛憐地撫摸著他的妻子。
The lonely child longs for his mother's caress. 這個孤獨的孩子渴望母親的愛撫。
She chats to her sister on phone every day. 她每天都和她的姊姊打電話聊天。
You may drop in for a chat whenever you want to. 你隨時想要時都可以停留一下聊個天。
I can't communicate with them; the radio doesn't work. 我無法和他們聯繫，無線電壞了。
I keep companionship with my old friends. 我與老朋友始終保持著友誼。

senses.zh: 能共處的；可並立的 **形** 兼用的；（電腦）相容的

examples: The couple separated because they were not compatible. 這對夫妻因不合而分居。
related: congruous 形 適合的；協調的

examples: You have no cause for complaint. 你沒有理由抱怨。
related: bitter 形 苦的；不滿的

examples: We will make some concessions in price. 我們將在價格上做些讓步。
related: give in 動 讓步；妥協

examples: The president condemned the terrorists. 總統譴責恐怖主義者。
The criminal was condemned to death. 這個罪犯被判死刑。
He told me the confidential information. 他向我透露了這個祕密的資訊。
related: off the record 副 私下地

examples: We must telephone our congratulations to the happy couple. 我們得打電話給那對幸福的夫婦表示祝賀。
related: congratulatory speech 名 祝賀詞

examples: The professor invited his students to his home for conversation. 教授邀請學生們到自己家裡聊天。
Her father reluctantly consented to the marriage. 她父親勉強答應了這樁婚姻。
My father will never give his consent to our marriage. 我父親決不會同意我們的婚姻的。
You are so considerate. 你真體貼。
Your company has been a great consolation to me. 你的陪伴對我是極大的安慰。

senses.zh: 操縱台；（電腦的）操作桌；（管風琴的）演奏台

examples: Nothing could console him when his pet dog died. 他的愛犬死後，什麼事情也不能使他感到寬慰。
There are many lights and electrical instruments on the computer console. 電腦控制板上有許多小燈和電子設備。
Such conduct is beneath contempt. 這種舉動為人所不齒。
related: scorn 名 動 藐視

examples: Several teams are contending for the prize. 有幾個隊在爭奪錦標。
I lost contact with most of my friends. 我和大多數的朋友都失去連絡。
I had been trying to contact you, but failed. 我之前試著要連絡你，但是沒有辦法。
related: contact lens 名 隱形眼鏡

senses.zh: 相對應的職位或人 **名** （契約等的）副本

examples: The U.S President is to meet his European counterparts to discuss the global economic recession. 美國總統將與歐洲首長會面商議全球經濟衰退的議題。
You are deceiving yourself if you still believe that she loves you. 你如果還相信她愛你，就是在欺騙自己。
I despise his refusing to accept responsibility. 他拒不承擔責任，我鄙視他。
related: look down on 動 輕視

examples: Most plays are written in dialogue. 大多數戲劇都是用對話體寫的。
That defeat was a surprise and a disappointment. 那次失敗令人吃驚，令人失望。
I'll certainly be most discreet in my conversation. 我在談話中當然會十分小心。
related: prudent 形 審慎的；小心的

examples: People should not be discriminated against. 人們不應該被歧視對待。
Dogs are good at discriminating between different smells. 狗擅長分辨不同的氣味。
He fell into disgrace with his companions. 他的朋友都看不起他。
After the defeat, the two generals were publicly disgraced. 那兩位將軍吃了敗仗之後，在公眾心目中威望掃地。
This newspaper article is a disgraceful intrusion into my private life. 報紙上的這篇文章是對我私生活的侵擾，這種做法很不光彩。
He has a distrust of strangers. 他不信任陌生人。
He's so suspicious that he distrusts even his own mother. 他這人疑心太重，連自己的母親也不相信。
I don't feel sorry for the leave of someone who I've always disliked. 對一個我從來都不喜歡的人的離開，我並不感到遺憾。
She spoke of him with great dislike. 她非常厭煩地談到了他。
The mother embraced her daughter emotionally. 母親激動地擁抱她的女兒。
She eagerly embraced the offer of a trip to Europe. 她熱情地接受了到歐洲旅行的建議。
Her talents were the envy of all her friends. 她多才多藝，所有的朋友都很羨慕她。
I have always envied your good luck. 我一直羨慕你運氣好。
He is highly esteemed in business circles. 他在商界極受人尊重。
Shakespeare is esteemed as one of the greatest playwrights in the world. 莎士比亞被視為世界上最偉大的劇作家之一。
They have great esteem for his learning. 他們非常敬重他的學識。
You can't divorce science from ethical problems. 不能把科學與倫理問題截然分開。

senses.zh: 種族的 **名** 少數民族的一份子

examples: The students are from a variety of ethnic backgrounds. 這些學生來自不同的民族背景。
The scenery was beautiful beyond expression. 那風景美麗得無法形容。
I can never tell from her expression what is in her mind. 我永遠無法從她的表情看出她心中到底在想什麼。
I am not really familiar with the local laws. 實際上我對當地的法律並不熟。
She doesn't like to be too familiar with her students. 她不喜歡和她的學生過度親密。
related: well-known 形 眾所皆知的

examples: She went through the company's accounts, looking for evidence of fraud. 她仔細審核公司的帳目，查找詐欺的證據。
He greeted me in the street with a friendly wave of the hand. 他在街上向我親切地揮手致意。
They are coming to the party as my guests. 他們作為我的客人出席晚會。

senses.zh: 榮耀 **動** 尊敬；使榮耀

examples: He won honor for his courage. 他以勇氣贏得大家的尊敬。
She was humiliated because her children behaved so badly. 她為她的孩子表現不好而感到羞辱。
We couldn't induce the old lady to travel by air. 我們無法勸服那老太太乘飛機旅行。
They may feel jealous of his success. 他們也許妒嫉他的成功。

senses.zh: 仿製品；模仿 **名** 模擬考試

examples: Her brother always mocks her whenever she makes a mistake. 她的哥哥總是在她犯錯時嘲笑她。
The army training exercises ended with a mock battle. 軍事訓練演習以一場模擬戰結束。
The teacher asked us to have a mock according to the actress's performance. 老師讓我們根據那個女演員的表演進行模仿。
I only wear a tie on special occasions. 我只在特殊場合才打領帶。
Stephen's behavior occasioned his parents much anxiety. 史蒂芬的行為使其父母十分擔心。
He is not an opponent of my friend. 他不是我朋友的對手。
Pardon me for disturbing you. 請原諒我打擾你。
He knelt before the king and asked for pardon. 他跪在國王面前請求赦免。
It is polite to say "please" when you are asking for something. 當你向別人要東西的時候，說聲「請」才有禮貌。
Everybody praises Hangzhou for its scenery. 人人都讚美杭州的風景。
He had a lot of praise for Tom's work. 他對湯姆的工作大加讚賞。
related: praiseworthy 形 值得稱讚的

examples: You should take an umbrella as a precaution. 你該帶把傘，有備無患。
I can never resist ice cream. 我對冰淇淋無法抗拒。
Their relationship has lasted many years. 他們的感情已經有很多年了。
I deeply respect her courage. 我深深敬佩她的勇氣。
If they had any respect for human life, they wouldn't do such terrible things. 他們如果對人的生命還有任何尊重，就不會做出這樣可怕的事來。
Please give my respects to your parents. 請代我向你的父母問候。
There is a rumor that there will be a general election in the autumn. 據傳聞今秋將舉行普選。
It is rumored that he has escaped to Dublin. 有謠言稱他逃到了都柏林。
They took off their hats by the grave in silent salute. 他們在墓旁脫帽默哀。
The soldier saluted the officer. 士兵向軍官敬禮。
The villagers knew about the scandal. 村子裡的居民知道這件醜事。
He stammered his thanks. 他結結巴巴地道了謝。
The boy dare not answer the questions because of his stammer. 這個小男孩因為結巴不敢回答老師的問題。
She was just teasing. 她只是在開玩笑。
He is a terrible tease. 他是個愛戲弄人的人。
related: make fun of 動 取笑

examples: He was tempted into making a false step. 他被引誘做了一件傻事。
The bag of sweets on the table was too strong a temptation for the child to resist. 桌上那包糖果對那孩子是個難以抗拒的誘惑。
He made a voluntary statement to the police. 他自願為警方作供詞。
Can I have a volunteer to wash the dishes? 誰自願來幫忙收拾一下這些盤子？
He volunteered a statement to the police. 他自動向警方供出情況。
The union took an active part in the strike. 工會在這次罷工中發揮了積極的作用。
His bravery is admirable. 他的勇氣令人欽佩。
related: respectable 形 值得尊敬的

examples: She speaks English so well that her friends are filled with admiration. 她的英語說得好極了，朋友們都讚歎不已。
He had the ambition of being a pianist when he was young. 他在年輕時曾經有過想當鋼琴家的雄心。
Do you really want to go, or are you just being amiable? 你是真想去呢，還是僅僅為了表示友好？
My little daughter is as lovely as an angel. 我的小女兒像天使一樣可愛。
To our astonishment, they rejected our offer. 使我們驚訝的是，他們竟然拒絕了我們的提議。
He often speaks in an arrogant tone. 他經常以一種傲慢的口氣說話。
related: self-centered 形 自我中心的

senses.zh: 有吸引力的；嫵媚動人的

examples: Your proposal sounds very attractive. 你的提議聽起來很吸引人。
related: desirable 形 富有魅力的

examples: He is an awesome challenger. 他是個可敬的對手。
Your performance was awesome! 你的表演真是太棒了！
He is a brave young man. 他是一個勇敢的年輕人。
The soldier was rewarded for his bravery. 那位士兵因為他的勇敢而被表揚。
The brutal murder shocked everyone. 這件殘忍的謀殺案件震驚了每個人。
He told us to proceed with caution. 他要我們謹慎行事。
I must caution you against the danger. 我必須告誡你應謹防危險。
He is cautious in his choice of words. 他措辭很謹慎。
Her charm of manner made her very popular. 她風度優雅，備受歡迎。
He charms everyone he meets. 他使他遇見的每一個人都感到愉快。

senses.zh: 個性；人格 **名** （小說；戲劇等的）人物；角色

examples: A person with good character is not known for lying. 有好人格的人不會說謊。
I wish this book was written in bigger characters. 我希望這本書的字再大一點兒。
You should be charitable with him; he is a child after all. 你應該對他寬容些，畢竟他還是個孩子。

senses.zh: 愛說話的；暢談的；愛社交的

examples: I don't find Peter very communicative. 我覺得彼得很不愛說話。

senses.zh: 能共處的；可並立的 **形** 兼用式的；（電腦）相容的

examples: The couple separated because they were not compatible. 這對夫妻因不合而分居。
related: quarrelsome 形 喜歡爭吵的

examples: This young man is full of conceit. 這個年輕人非常自負。
We should be conscientious in our work. 我們應該對工作負責。
Cowards die many times before their death. 懦夫在死前已經死過很多次了。

senses.zh: 缺陷；缺點 **動** 脫逃；脫離

examples: His greed is his fatal defect. 貪婪便是他致命的弱點。
He's got such an enormous ego. 他是個自我意識很強的人。
related: egoist 名 自我中心者
egoistic 形 自我本位的

examples: Do you have faith in me? 你對我有信心嗎？
It's a multi-faith society; everyone should learn to respect different religions. 這是個多元信仰的社會，每個人都應該學習尊重不同的宗教。
The novel displays a fascinating world constructed on wild imagination. 這本小說展示了一個建造在狂野想像上的迷人世界。
Stamp collecting holds a certain fascination for me. 我特別喜愛集郵。
He is a political fanatic. 他是一個政治狂。
She's fanatic about rock music. 她對搖滾樂很狂熱。
He's got undeniable glamour as a singer and an actor. 他作為歌手和演員的魅力是無可否認的。
Do you think sexual fidelity in marriage is important? 你覺得婚姻中的忠實重要嗎？
He is as handsome as (handsome) can be. 他瀟灑極了。
He made a handsome profit on his stocks. 他在股票上獲得很大一筆利益。
Ours is a heroic age. 我們的時代是一個英雄的時代。

senses.zh: 異性戀者 **形** 異性戀的

examples: All the handsome, nice and heterosexual men are married. 又帥又好又不是同性戀的男人都結婚了。
I am not honest with you. 我沒有對你誠實。
Honesty is the best policy. 誠實是最佳上策。
She is always hospitable to her guests. 她總是招待她的賓客。
The host's hospitality left us a very good impression. 主人的好客給我們留下了非常好的印象。
The more noble, the more humble. 結實愈豐者，其穗愈低。
She came from a humble family. 她來自一個平凡的家庭。
It's not easy for him to humble himself to ask for help. 要他放低身段求助是很不容易的。
The accident was caused by human error. 這宗事故是人為過失造成的。
What is the difference between humans and animals? 人類和動物的差別在哪裡？
She has no sense of humor. 她毫無幽默感。
His hypocrisy makes me sick. 我很討厭他那麼虛偽。
Many politicians are hypocritical. 很多的政治家都很虛偽。
related: artificial 形 矯揉造作的

examples: He is nothing but a hypocrite, pretending that he knows nothing about it. 他是一個虛偽的人，假裝對那件事一無所知。
We do not live in an ideal world. Be practical! 我們並不活在一個理想的世界。實際一點吧！
He finds it hard to live up to his ideals. 他發現很難活出自己的理想。
He is an idiot to agree such a thing. 他實在是個傻瓜，才會同意這樣的事。
The peaches are not yet mature. 桃子還沒有成熟。
